question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/oracle/oracle_attest_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Missing Event Fields] AttestationResolved event at lines 126-130 doesn't include guardian_id unlike AttestationCreated - can this information asymmetry prevent proper audit trails for resolved attestations?
